name: ls
description: List directory contents and file information

options.name: path
options.description: The directory or file path to list. Defaults to current directory if not specified.

options.name: all
options.description: Include directory entries whose names begin with a dot ('.').

options.name: long
options.description: List files in the long format.

options.name: human_readable
options.description: When used with the -l option, use unit suffixes: Byte, Kilobyte, Megabyte, Gigabyte, Terabyte and Petabyte in order to reduce the number of digits to four or fewer using base 2 for sizes.

options.name: sort_by_time
options.description: Sort by descending time modified (most recently modified first).

options.name: reverse_order
options.description: Reverse the order of the sort.

hints.primary: List directory contents and file information
